title: THREE BEDROOM LOWER GROSSE POINTE PARK MUST SEE
posting_body: ['Gorgeous updated hardwood floors,--all appliances INCLUDED.', 'Front screen porch.', 'Separate laundry in basement--', 'You have immediate access to GP schools, two resident only parks--two resident only movie theaters- gym----three libraries---pools--etc.', 'Automatic garage space too.', 'Water is included---', ' Both --snow removal is included--lawn care is included.', 'WALK to many restaurants, bars, stores.', 'Right on the bus line and trolley line too.', "Don't wait...will not be available long.", 'Sorry, no pets or smoking.', 'Please call---', 'I will not answer texts.', 'Thank you.', 'Available April 30.', 'Thorough background check and credit checks certainly will be done.', 'Call for an appointment.', 'No emails please, they will not be answered.', 'Good luck !', 'Call', 'show contact info']
